title: RISNET base object schema
description: Schema for the RISNET base object type

ris_id.description: UUID (generated once and never changed during the lifetime of an object; principal identifier)

country.description: ISO 3166 alpha 2, comma separated values if multiple countries are affected

name.description: Name of the object, the entity type is not repeated in the object name.

language.description: default language for this object in line with ISO 639-1

isrs_codes.description: ISRS Location Code included for backwards compatibility. Combined code: Block 1 (UN/LOCODE) + Block 2 (Fairway section code) +  Block 3 (Object Reference Code) + Block 4 (Fairway hectometer). This can be a list if multiple ISRS codes are associated with the list. Max 20 codes, comma seperated.

mrn.description: Maritime Resource Name for connection with the maritime domain, S-401 and general harmonization with S-100. MRN are being defined by local competent authorities. This could be the ID embedded in a dedicated namespace.

authority.description: Name of the authority (organisation) responsible for the related entity

data_source.description: The organisation that produces the data and is responsible for maintaining it

created.description: Timestamp when the object was added

modified.description: Timestamp when the object was modified

valid_from.description: Date from when the object is valid

valid_to.description: Date until the object is valid

reason_of_change.description: short explanation why the object was changed

remark.description: Free text field to provide additional non-standardized information.
